page.title: 15CRAIG'S DAY-AUCHINLECK
page.content: On a typical day I get up at 7.30, have breakfast,read the newspaper then watch Breakfast Television. At 8.30 I go and collect my little cousin and take her to Nursery school which is next to Auchinleck Primary. Then I play at football or chasing games with my friends until the school starts at 9.05. In school I work through my lessons of Maths,Language,Social Studies and Art. There is a 15 minute interval at 11.05 and one hour lunch break at 12.30.When school finishes at 3.20 I go home,do my homework,get changed and then go to play with my friend Mark. After playing I go home,watch television,have my supper and go to bed.
